
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VSpdifChannelStatus.cpp
          VSpdifChannelStatus.h
          VSpdifChannelStatus__Syms.cpp
          VSpdifChannelStatus__Syms.h
          VSpdifChannelStatus__Trace.cpp
          VSpdifChannelStatus__Trace__Slow.cpp
  DEPENDS SpdifChannelStatus.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SpdifChannelStatus.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VSpdifChannelStatus STATIC
    VSpdifChannelStatus.cpp
    VSpdifChannelStatus__Syms.cpp
    VSpdifChannelStatus__Trace.cpp
    VSpdifChannelStatus__Trace__Slow.cpp
    SpdifChannelStatus.v
)

target_compile_options(VSpdifChannelStatus PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VSpdifChannelStatus PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VSpdifChannelStatus verilated)
